thread.title: Is YOUR Morrisons closing? Supermarket reveals list of stores shutting their doors
thread.title_full: Is YOUR Morrisons closing? Supermarket reveals list of stores shutting their doors

title: Is YOUR Morrisons closing? Supermarket reveals list of stores shutting their doors
text: StreathamTyldesleyThe move is expected to be permanent but group would not confirm if the stores will close their doors for good.Morrisons boss David Potts said last week the decision was made with great regret, but added there was no way to make the affected stores viable.The fresh round of closures comes on top of 10 supermarkets already shut earlier this year It comes as the retailer struggles to cope with rising competition from discounters Aldi and Lidl, with sales falling by 2.7 per cent over the past year.Customers now expect bargains and don't look likely to change shopping habits, which means it is difficult to raise prices and increase profits, according to Morrisons.Mr Potts said the chain faced a long journey to improve its fortunes after pre-tax profits having almost halved in six months.The retailer is also selling 140 of its local convenience stores for around Â£25 million in an effort to concentrate trade on its larger supermarkets, but the move will not create any further job losses.
